CustomField.description: Indicates if the call was made to an internal number
CustomField.formula: OR ( CONTAINS( Subject , "949344"), CONTAINS( Subject , "949421"), CONTAINS( Subject , "212230"), CONTAINS( Subject , "305748000"), CONTAINS( Subject , "877820"), CONTAINS( Subject , "31034070"), CONTAINS( Subject , "8133794350"), CONTAINS( Subject , "949288"))
CustomField.label: Internal Call
